PyAMS Library
  • Installation
  • Edit on GitHub

Installation

To install pyams_lib, use the following command:

pip install pyams_lib

To upgrade to the latest version:

pip install --upgrade pyams_lib

License

pyams_lib is free to use and distributed under the GPLv3 license.
